name: Nursery Slime
description:
Nursery Slime is an RPG game developed by Doubles Core (だぶるすこあ) and published by OTAKU Plan

STORY

The protagonist was an adventurer who standing at a dead-end.
Because he had to return to his old business as his livelihood, he met a strange slime in a quest.
The slime, which is brought his home, not only suddenly became a beautiful girl, but even fell in love with him at her first sight.
... In this way, the hilarious daily life of the loser adventurer and the slime girl began.

FEATURES

  • Classic Japanese RPG
  • Happy and fluent pure love story
  • Transformation system
  • Ability training system
